interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wavertree & London Pineapple, Coconut & Lime (1 Bar)
Review Date: 2020/08/21
Store: Simple Scents Australia
Product Description: ['Australian Soapworks Wavertree & London 200g Soap - Pineapple, Coconut & Limeis produced in Australia by dedicated artisan soap makers using the traditional French Milling process. The soaps are wrapped in embossed paper and enriched with pure Organic Shea Butter.Tropical ingredients rejuvenate sun-damaged skin, improving overall skin texture. Lime invigorates the lungs, vitamin C encourages collagen renewal, and coconut fortifies skin and seals in moisture.']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Simple Scents Australia', 'Scent': 'Coconut,Pineapple,Lime', 'Material Feature': 'Organic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 2.5 x 0.8 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B010C79OCA_US', 'Manufacturer': 'Simple Scents Australia'}
Review Text: Smells so much better than expected! I got the beach scent for Christmas and liked the quality lathering 🧼 so I was curious to try this one and it smells like just like the Sandals Resorts lotions/soaps which is very lemongrass like. Super pleased. Love the brand and the shipping was super fast.
Review Title: So pleased with the smell and quick delivery
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Wavertree & London Pineapple, Coconut & Lime (1 Bar)
Simple Scents Australia
['Australian Soapworks Wavertree & London 200g Soap - Pineapple, Coconut & Limeis produced in Australia by dedicated artisan soap makers using the traditional French Milling process. The soaps are wrapped in embossed paper and enriched with pure Organic Shea Butter.Tropical ingredients rejuvenate sun-damaged skin, improving overall skin texture. Lime invigorates the lungs, vitamin C encourages collagen renewal, and coconut fortifies skin and seals in moisture.']

Smells so much better than expected! I got the beach scent for Christmas and liked the quality lathering 🧼 so I was curious to try this one and it smells like just like the Sandals Resorts lotions/soaps which is very lemongrass like. Super pleased. Love the brand and the shipping was super fast.
So pleased with the smell and quick delivery
profile: The user demonstrates a strong preference for high-quality personal care products, particularly soaps with tropical and refreshing scents. They appreciate fragrances that evoke a beach or vacation ambiance, as indicated by their liking for coconut, pineapple, and lime scents, which are associated with rejuvenation and moisturizing qualities. Quality and lathering performance are important to this user, as they specifically mention their satisfaction with the product's ability to lather well. Their experience with fast shipping suggests they value efficient service and prompt delivery. The user’s review reflects an affinity for artisan and organic products, indicating a preference for brands that prioritize natural ingredients and craftsmanship. Overall, their feedback conveys enthusiasm for sensory-rich experiences and effective skincare solutions, coupled with a favorable perception of reliable service from the brand.
